Articles.Content:
Hello and welcome back to the M.A.X. AEROSPACE showroom! Today we are showcasing a new heavy lifter design, the J-1.

The J-1 is designed to be able to bring heavy loads to orbit and make very long range missions. In this configuration it holds a small backup stage and a skycrane style lander for a high speed cart.

In this stable orbit at 126km it has 854 liters of fuel in each outer stack plus the entire center stack of fuel.

-

Full Gallery: http://imgur.com/a/Vj7IU#0

Full M.A.X. AEROSPACE Inventory: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/18657-SSTO-s-Heavy-Lifters-and-More-at-M-A-X-AEROSPACE%21

Requires 0.16 and the Cart mod
